key.name: h0
key.description: Language mixed into hybrid language tag. The key type (value) must be valid language tag. Example: es-t-h0-en for Spanglish

key.name: h1
key.description: Language mixed into hybrid translation source. The key type (value) must be valid language tag. There must be a -t- subtag with a valid language tag value also. Example: es-t-hi-h1-en for Spanish translated from Hinglish.
